note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Apply External Power to the AC Buses.
Select No. 2 Main Aft Boost Pump ON.
Start and run APU using normal procedures.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to APU selector switch: "DC FUEL PUMP INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar the P6 panel DC FUEL PUMP APU circuit breaker.
